Description.title: Experience Egypt Like Never Before
Description.desc: Our Tourist Guide application is your ultimate companion when visiting Egypt. Whether you're looking for the perfect hotel, craving delicious food, or seeking out must-see landmarks, we've got you covered. Discover detailed information about each hotel, including the services they offer, room costs, reviews, and ratings. Find top-rated restaurants, explore exciting activities, and easily navigate public or private transportationâ€”all at affordable prices. Let us help you make the most of your visit to Egypt with comprehensive and user-friendly guides.

pyramidsOfGiza.title: Pyramids of Giza
pyramidsOfGiza.description: Explore the iconic pyramids and the Sphinx, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

luxorTemple.title: Luxor Temple
luxorTemple.description: Discover the magnificent Luxor Temple with its grand columns and historical significance.

valleyOfTheKings.title: Valley of the Kings
valleyOfTheKings.description: Visit the Valley of the Kings and explore the tombs of ancient Egyptian kings and queens.

abuSimbel.title: Abu Simbel
abuSimbel.description: Marvel at the colossal statues of Ramses II and his queen at Abu Simbel.

variousAdventures.title: Various Adventures
variousAdventures.description: Temporary work and great pain. Some uncertain details.

adventurousTrails.title: Adventurous Trails
adventurousTrails.description: Great pain and pleasure in seeking new experiences and exploring.

trainedGuides.title: Trained Guides
trainedGuides.description: Experienced guides who provide assistance and support.

familyTrips.title: Family Trips
familyTrips.description: Trips designed for family enjoyment and togetherness.

customPackages.title: Custom Packages
customPackages.description: Customizable packages designed to meet specific needs.

completeGuide.title: Complete Guide
completeGuide.description: A comprehensive guide covering all necessary information.
